焭字的基本解释

焭
qióng
古同“茕”。
古通“琼”，骰子，古代博戏的一种用具。

焭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qióng］
［《廣韻》渠營切，平清，羣。］
(1)同“煢”。
(2)同“惸”。
(3)赌具。骰子。

焭字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　焭； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页674第20
【廣韻】渠營切【集韻】葵營切，?音?。【廣韻】本作煢。詳煢字註。　又【集韻】本作惸。憂也。【楚辭·九章】䰟識路之焭焭。【註】憂也。　又與營通。【楚辭·九章】一作營營。　【字彙】《顏氏家訓》云：古爲大博則六著，小博則二焭。二焭義無所考。◎按《廣韻》博?子，一名投子，二焭當卽二?也。《正字通》作橩，从木，誤。

焭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
焭字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
qióng
Ancient Tong "茕".
Ancient Tong "Jong", dice, a kind of utensil in ancient gambling.
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qióng］
["Guangyun" Qu Yingqie, Pingqing, Qun. ]
(1) Same as "茕".
(2) Same as "茕".
(3) Gambling equipment. dice.
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　焭; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 674 No. 20
[Guangyun] Quying cut [Jiyun] Kuying cut, "yin". [Guang Yun] This is a lotus flower. Detailed notes on the words of 茕.　[Jiyun] This is a long time. Worry too. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Chapters] Yan Yan, who knows the road. [Note] Worry also.　And Yingtong again. [Songs of the Chu Nine Chapters] One camp.　[Vocabulary] "The Family Instructions of the Yan Family" says: In ancient times, there are six works for Dabo, and two for Xiaobo. Er Yan has nothing to test. ◎According to the "Guang Yun" blog, one voter, the second one is the second one. "Zhengzitong" is made from the wood, wrong.
